# Problem 1

## Importing Data Tables
```{r}
library(readxl)
Trash_Wheel_Data = read_excel("data/Trash-Wheel-Collection-Totals-8-6-19.xlsx", 1) %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>%
  drop_na(dumpster) %>%
  select(-x15, -x16, -x17) %>%
  mutate(sports_balls = as.integer(round(sports_balls,0)))
```
